FuncDef: The display port-tx-enabling-delay command displays information about the delay for an interface to send signals.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the controller type.
The value can be:
CPOS

Examples: Cpos1/0/0 setted port-tx-enabling delay time is: 0ms
Cpos1/0/0 remanent time of enabling port-tx is: 0ms
ExtraInfo: After a delay is configured for an interface to send signals using the port-tx-enabling-delay command, you can run the display port-tx-enabling-delay command to check the configured delay and the remaining time for the interface to send signals.
